    • About me

    My name is Maria

    Hello! I am a professional photographer with deep respect for the art of image-making. Photography for me is a way of seeing the world through a special prism, where every detail and every moment takes on a special meaning. My passion for photography began in my youth when I first picked up a camera. Since then, I have never stopped learning and improving my skills, striving to convey beauty and emotion through my work. Over the years, I have learnt many styles and techniques, allowing me to adapt to any needs and challenges. I love working with people and bringing out their true emotions and moments. Whether it's a wedding ceremony, a family celebration or just a portrait session, I strive to capture each moment in a way that tells its own unique story.

    Individual approach

    I believe that every client is unique and so I approach each photo shoot with individual attention. I listen carefully to your wishes and ideas to create images that fully meet your expectations.

    High quality work

    Using modern equipment and advanced photo processing technologies, I guarantee the high quality of each photo. My pictures are distinguished by clarity, colour saturation and attention to detail.

    Creativity and innovation

    I am always on the lookout for new ideas and creative solutions. No matter what exactly you want to capture - from classic portraits to original conceptual shoots - I am ready to offer you something special and unique.

    Services

    The art of photography in every frame

    Wedding photoshoots

    The perfect moments of your special day, embodied in elegant and romantic photographs. Trust me to capture your love, emotions and important moments to create an unforgettable story of your wedding.

    Commercial shooting

    Professional photography for your business or project. I offer quality and stylish images that will emphasise the uniqueness of your product or service. Trust me to bring your visual image to life in every shot.

    Studio shooting

    Professional photographs are created in a cosy and creative studio environment. I offer a personalised approach to each client, ensuring quality and stylish images. Let me capture your uniqueness with light, shadow and studio atmosphere.

    Portfolio

    Beauty through my lens

    "I truly believe that every person and every story deserves to be shown. Let's create unforgettable visual stories together and share them with the world!"
